channel.title: NPR Topics: Culture
channel.description: Art and entertainment commentary plus interviews, book reviews, movie reviews, music reviews, comedy, and visual art. Subscribe to podcasts and follow trends in music, painting, art, architecture, photography, and design.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Disney names Josh D'Amaro as its new CEO
item.description: D'Amaro will take over next month from Bob Iger, who has led the company for nearly two decades.
item.content:encoded:
D'Amaro will take over next month from Bob Iger, who has led the company for nearly two decades.

(Image credit: Ricardo Moreira/Getty Images for Disney
)
item.dc:creator: Mandalit del Barco

item.title: Award winning poet Kimberly M. Blaeser combines science and spirituality
item.description: Kimberly Blaeser, a former poet laureate of Wisconsin, will accept a prize from the National Book Foundation next month for her collection of poems, Ancient Light.
item.content:encoded: Kimberly Blaeser, a former poet laureate of Wisconsin, will accept a prize from the National Book Foundation next month for her collection of poems, Ancient Light.
item.dc:creator: Neda Ulaby

item.title: How Rupert Murdoch created a media empire -- and 'broke' his own family
item.description: Journalist Gabriel Sherman has covered the Murdoch family for nearly two decades. In his new book, Bonfire of the Murdochs, he chronicles the protracted public battle for control the family business.
item.content:encoded: Journalist Gabriel Sherman has covered the Murdoch family for nearly two decades. In his new book, Bonfire of the Murdochs, he chronicles the protracted public battle for control the family business.
item.dc:creator: Sam Fragoso

item.title: A new generation revives 'The Muppet Show' and it's as delightful as ever
item.description: This isn't the first reincarnation of Jim Henson's crew, but it's one of the best in a very long time. Seth Rogen is an executive producer, and Maya Rudolph and Sabrina Carpenter guest star.
item.content:encoded: This isn't the first reincarnation of Jim Henson's crew, but it's one of the best in a very long time. Seth Rogen is an executive producer, and Maya Rudolph and Sabrina Carpenter guest star.
item.dc:creator: David Bianculli

item.title: PepsiCo will cut prices on Lay's, Cheetos by as much as 15%
item.description: The food giant is among many big brands worried as shoppers pull back on snack budgets after years of stubborn inflation.
item.content:encoded:
The food giant is among many big brands worried as shoppers pull back on snack budgets after years of stubborn inflation.

(Image credit: Justin Sullivan)
item.dc:creator: Alina Selyukh

item.title: What should we watch next? Share your movie recommendations with us
item.description: So you've watched the best picture nominees — now what? We're trying to help our readers find their next movie, and we need your help.
item.content:encoded:
So you've watched the best picture nominees — now what? We're trying to help our readers find their next movie, and we need your help.

(Image credit: Angela Weiss)
item.dc:creator: Beth Novey

item.title: I thought I'd heard my dad's voice for the last time. A movie helped me find it again
item.description: A period drama, a Supreme Court case and voice our film critic hadn't heard in decades.
item.content:encoded: A period drama, a Supreme Court case and voice our film critic hadn't heard in decades.
item.dc:creator: Bob Mondello

item.title: 19 Winter Olympic storylines we're watching (they're not just about sports)
item.description: The Winter Olympics promise plenty of high adrenaline, fierce competition, historic firsts and emotional moments over 2 1/2 weeks. Here are some of the names and narratives to keep an eye on.
item.content:encoded: The Winter Olympics promise plenty of high adrenaline, fierce competition, historic firsts and emotional moments over 2 1/2 weeks. Here are some of the names and narratives to keep an eye on.
item.dc:creator: NPR Staff

item.title: The 'Melania' movie audience: Older white women
item.description: The pricey Amazon documentary did well in areas like Dallas, Tampa, Phoenix, Houston, Atlanta and West Palm Beach. Amazon says a docuseries is also on the way.
item.content:encoded:
The pricey Amazon documentary did well in areas like Dallas, Tampa, Phoenix, Houston, Atlanta and West Palm Beach. Amazon says a docuseries is also on the way.

(Image credit: Spencer Platt)
item.dc:creator: Ivy Buck

item.title: Trump says he's closing the Kennedy Center for renovations. We have questions
item.description: After President Trump announced plans for a "Complete Rebuilding" of the Kennedy Center in Washington, D.C., what exactly did he mean, and what does it mean for the arts?
item.content:encoded:
After President Trump announced plans for a "Complete Rebuilding" of the Kennedy Center in Washington, D.C., what exactly did he mean, and what does it mean for the arts?

(Image credit: Jim Watson)
item.dc:creator: Anastasia Tsioulcas
